item.description:
Gillette Castle is all decorated for the holiday season! Come to see the beautiful, traditional Christmas decor, and the meticulous craftmanship of this historic park. Tours of the castle cost $5 for adults and $3 for children. Afterwards we will hike the old rairoad trail along the Connecticut River. If you have never been here, you are missing out!!!

The hike should be around 3 miles. The tour takes about 30 minutes. I will be incorporating food into this event somehow. Any suggestions?

Click here to learn more
